extends java.rmi.Remote

        void initSimul(java.lang.String logFileName,
               int[][] contestantStrength)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Initialize the simulation.
        Parameters:
        logFileName - name of the log file
        contestantStrength - strength of each contestant
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

      • endGame

        void endGame(int team,
             boolean knockout)
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        End game.
        Parameters:
        team - winning team
        knockout - true if game was won by knockout, false if game was won by points
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails
